definition: word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: This word appears frequently in the article.
sentences.chinese: 這個詞在這篇文章中的詞頻很高。

sentences.english: The present experiment investigated whether the processing of pronouns is affected by the lexical frequency of their antecedents.
sentences.chinese: 採用眼動分析法考察先行詞詞頻對代詞加工的影響。

sentences.english: The most frequently-used prepositions were also picked out after statistical work.
sentences.chinese: 本文還將通過對介詞詞頻的統計，整理出常用介詞。
